rules_locked.highlights_scope: weekly_highlights shows ONLY events in the current week (Sun–Sun). Max 4.
rules_locked.venue_regulars: Do not change unless explicitly requested.
rules_locked.venue_specials: Future-dated only; keep ~60 days forward; auto-drop past items.
rules_locked.sports: Full season schedules live in sports_schedules; Metro Sports slide shows this week’s OU/OSU/Thunder only.
rules_locked.fairs: Only active/coming fairs; expired fairs removed; Oklahoma State Fair retained when in season.
rules_locked.goldfish_paragraph: Persist in GOLDFISH SWIM SCHOOL (MOORE) → regular.
